"notes": [
"The script uses various functions, including `package_install`, `aur_package_install`, `is_package_installed`, `contains_element`, `system_ctl`, `add_key`, `add_repository`, `check_root`, `check_archlinux`, `check_hostname`, `check_connection`, `check_pacman_blocked`, `check_multilib`, `pacman_key`, `system_update`, `pause_function`, `read_input_text`, `replace_line`, `add_line`, `add_module`, `add_user_to_group`, `config_xinitrc`, `run_as_user`, `check_vga`, `getkeymap`, `settimezone`, `hostnamectl`, `timedatectl`, `mkdir`, `chown`, `chmod`, `usermod`, `modprobe`, `freshclam`, `hosts-update`, `sensors-detect`, `systemctl`, `dmidecode`, `su`, `grep`, `less`, and `reboot`. ",
"The script relies on the `sharedfuncs` file for common functions. ",
"The script uses the `AUR_PKG_MANAGER` variable to specify the preferred AUR helper tool. ",
"The script uses the `AUTOMATIC_MODE` variable to indicate if the automatic mode is enabled. ",
"The script uses the `KDE` variable to indicate if KDE is installed. ",
"The script uses the `LOCALE`, `LOCALE_KDE`, `LOCALE_FF`, `LOCALE_TB`, `LOCALE_HS`, `LOCALE_AS`, `LOCALE_LO`, `VIDEO_DRIVER`, `ARCHI`, `AUI_DIR`, `HN`, `ZONE`, `SUBZONE`, `USERSHARES_DIR`, `USERSHARES_GROUP`, `GITHUB_USER`, `GITHUB_REPO`, and `CUSTOMREPO` variables to store user input and system information.",
"The script uses the `checklist` array to track which sections have been completed."
]
